knimeNode.name: String To Number
knimeNode.shortDescription: Converts strings in a column to numbers.

fullDescription.intro: Converts strings in a column (or a set of columns) to numbers. If the node fails to parse a string, it will generate a missing cell and append a warning message to the KNIME Console with detailed information.
fullDescription.option: Choose the DataType that your string should be converted to.
Choose a decimal separator, which is used to mark the boundary between the integral and the fractional parts of the decimal string.
Choose a thousands separator used in the decimal string to group together three digits.
Move the columns of interest into the "Include" list

ports.outPort: PMML port object that reflects the performed operations.
